info.name: OCI_WAF_REST_UK_COLLECTION
info.description: This is a sample collection for invoking OCI REST APIs via POSTMAN

body.raw:
{
    "accessRules": [
        {
            "action": "BLOCK",
            "blockAction": "SHOW_ERROR_PAGE",
            "blockErrorPageCode": "Access Rules-403",
            "blockErrorPageDescription": "Access blocked - not from known source IP.",
            "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access is blocked.",
            "criteria": [
                {
                    "condition": "IP_IS_NOT",
                    "value": "1.2.3.4"
                }
            ],
            "name": "BlockRequestsNotfromMYIP"
        }
    ],
    "addressRateLimiting": {
        "allowedRatePerAddress": 1,
        "blockResponseCode": 503,
        "isEnabled": true,
        "maxDelayedCountPerAddress": 10
    },
    "captchas": [],
    "deviceFingerprintChallenge": {
        "action": "DETECT",
        "actionExpirationInSeconds": 60,
        "challengeSettings": {
            "blockAction": "SHOW_ERROR_PAGE",
            "blockErrorPageCode": "DFC",
            "blockErrorPageDescription": "Access blocked by website owner. Please contact support.",
            "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access to the website is blocked.",
            "blockResponseCode": 403,
            "captchaFooter": "Enter the letters and numbers as they are shown in image above.",
            "captchaHeader": "We have detected an increased number of attempts to access this website. To help us keep this site secure, please let us know that you are not a robot by entering the text from the image below.",
            "captchaSubmitLabel": "Yes, I am human.",
            "captchaTitle": "Are you human?"
        },
        "failureThreshold": 10,
        "failureThresholdExpirationInSeconds": 60,
        "isEnabled": false,
        "maxAddressCount": 20,
        "maxAddressCountExpirationInSeconds": 60
    },
    "goodBots": [],
    "humanInteractionChallenge": {
        "action": "DETECT",
        "actionExpirationInSeconds": 60,
        "challengeSettings": {
            "blockAction": "SHOW_ERROR_PAGE",
            "blockErrorPageCode": "HIC",
            "blockErrorPageDescription": "Access blocked by website owner. Please contact support.",
            "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access to the website is blocked.",
            "blockResponseCode": 403,
            "captchaFooter": "Enter the letters and numbers as they are shown in image above.",
            "captchaHeader": "We have detected an increased number of attempts to access this website. To help us keep this site secure, please let us know that you are not a robot by entering the text from the image below.",
            "captchaSubmitLabel": "Yes, I am human.",
            "captchaTitle": "Are you human?"
        },
        "failureThreshold": 10,
        "failureThresholdExpirationInSeconds": 60,
        "interactionThreshold": 3,
        "isEnabled": true,
        "recordingPeriodInSeconds": 15
    },
    "jsChallenge": {
        "action": "DETECT",
        "actionExpirationInSeconds": 60,
        "challengeSettings": {
            "blockAction": "SHOW_ERROR_PAGE",
            "blockErrorPageCode": "JSC-403",
            "blockErrorPageDescription": "Access blocked by website owner. Please contact support.",
            "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access to the website is blocked.",
            "blockResponseCode": 403,
            "captchaFooter": "Enter the letters and numbers as they are shown in image above.",
            "captchaHeader": "We have detected an increased number of attempts to access this website. To help us keep this site secure, please let us know that you are not a robot by entering the text from the image below.",
            "captchaSubmitLabel": "Yes, I am human.",
            "captchaTitle": "Are you human?"
        },
        "failureThreshold": 10,
        "isEnabled": false,
        "setHttpHeader": {
            "name": "x-jsc-alerts",
            "value": "{failed_amount}"
        }
    },
    "origin": "OCI-LBAAS",
    "protectionRules": [
        {
            "action": "BLOCK",
            "description": "detects SQL hex encoding evasion attacks",
            "exclusions": [],
            "key": "981260",
            "labels": [
                "SQL Injections",
                "WASCTC",
                "OWASP",
                "A1",
                "PCI",
                "Recommended"
            ],
            "modSecurityRuleIds": [
                "981260"
            ],
            "name": "SQL Hex Evasion Methods",
            "tags": [
                "SQL Injections",
                "WASCTC",
                "OWASP",
                "A1",
                "PCI",
                "Recommended"
            ]
        },
        {
            "action": "BLOCK",
            "description": "identifies common initial SQLi probing requests where attackers insert/append quote characters to the existing normal payload to see how the app/db responds",
            "exclusions": [],
            "key": "981318",
            "labels": [
                "SQL Injections",
                "WASCTC",
                "OWASP",
                "A1",
                "PCI",
                "Recommended"
            ],
            "modSecurityRuleIds": [
                "981318"
            ],
            "name": "String Termination/Statement Ending",
            "tags": [
                "SQL Injections",
                "WASCTC",
                "OWASP",
                "A1",
                "PCI",
                "Recommended"
            ]
        }
    ],
    "protectionSettings": {
        "allowedHttpMethods": [
            "GET",
            "POST",
            "HEAD",
            "OPTIONS"
        ],
        "blockAction": "SHOW_ERROR_PAGE",
        "blockErrorPageCode": "403",
        "blockErrorPageDescription": "Unexpected request detected by OCI WAF Protection Rules. If this message persist please contact support.",
        "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access to the website is blocked.",
        "blockResponseCode": 403,
        "isResponseInspected": false,
        "maxArgumentCount": 255,
        "maxNameLengthPerArgument": 400,
        "maxResponseSizeInKiB": 1024,
        "maxTotalNameLengthOfArguments": 64000,
        "mediaTypes": [
            "text/html",
            "text/plain"
        ],
        "recommendationsPeriodInDays": 10
    },
    "threatFeeds": [],
    "whitelists": []
}

{
    "action": "DETECT",
    "actionExpirationInSeconds": 60,
    "challengeSettings": {
        "blockAction": "SHOW_CAPTCHA",
        "blockErrorPageCode": "HIC",
        "blockErrorPageDescription": "Access blocked by website owner. Please contact support.",
        "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access to the website is blocked.",
        "blockResponseCode": 403,
        "captchaFooter": "Enter the letters and numbers as they are shown in image above.",
        "captchaHeader": "We have detected an increased number of attempts to access this website. To help us keep this site secure, please let us know that you are not a robot by entering the text from the image below.",
        "captchaSubmitLabel": "Yes, I am human.",
        "captchaTitle": "Are you human?"
    },
    "failureThreshold": 5,
    "failureThresholdExpirationInSeconds": 60,
    "interactionThreshold": 3,
    "isEnabled": true,
    "recordingPeriodInSeconds": 10
}

{
    "action": "BLOCK",
    "actionExpirationInSeconds": 60,
    "challengeSettings": {
        "blockAction": "SHOW_CAPTCHA",
        "blockErrorPageCode": "DFC",
        "blockErrorPageDescription": "Access blocked by website owner. Please contact support.",
        "blockErrorPageMessage": "Access to the website is blocked.",
        "captchaFooter": "Enter the letters and numbers as they are shown in image above.",
        "captchaHeader": "DFC detected an increased number of attempts to access this website. To help us keep this site secure, please let us know that you are not a robot by entering the text from the image below.",
        "captchaSubmitLabel": "Yes, I am human.",
        "captchaTitle": "Are you human?"
    },
    "failureThreshold": 5,
    "failureThresholdExpirationInSeconds": 60,
    "isEnabled": true,
    "maxAddressCount": 10,
    "maxAddressCountExpirationInSeconds": 60
}
